articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Clicks debuts its own take on the BlackBerry smartphone, plus a $79 snap-on mobile keyboard - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company behind the add-on mobile keyboards with physical buttons is now doing its own phone.
articles.content: Clicks Technology, a company known for making physical keyboards for smartphones, is launching two new devices ahead of the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas next week. In addition to a new, $79… [+4719 chars]
